mapper.update:
UPDATE saas_jw_class_rule_time
teach_time = #{teachTime},
create_time = #{createTime},
class_rule_id = #{classRuleId},
WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE saas_jw_class_rule_time
teach_time = #{map.teachTime},
create_time = #{map.createTime},
class_rule_id = #{map.classRuleId},
WHERE id = #{map.id}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM saas_jw_class_rule_time
AND id like CONCAT('%', #{id} , '%')
AND teach_time like CONCAT('%', #{teachTime} , '%')
AND create_time like CONCAT('%', #{createTime} , '%')
AND class_rule_id like CONCAT('%', #{classRuleId} , '%')
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ${sortBy}
